messages.subject: Funny music story
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/15/02 12:58:51 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/15/02 12:58:51 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< True. But unless you tell someone to play something note for note, you
lose
CONTROL!!
It did always seem to me in school that precision was stressed over
musicality, and mechanics over tone. >>

This is where I feel so gypped!! I was taught by this note to note
BS....never learned anything by ear.
I took a few years of piano, a couply years of flute, was in band and still
never learned much by ear. I did mess around at home, in between the life
sucking lessons and actually started to figure out, not the names of the
notes but listening to, and copying songs.
We are getting Trevor an electric guitar for Xmas. I think I'm going to take
lessons with him, just long enough for us both to learn some fingerings, and
then just do it the gypsy way after that.

Ren
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
And remember,
"A life lived in fear is a life half lived"
